channel.title: Projects on continuity
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on continuity

item.title: Comprehensive analysis of electronic noise and their noise spectra of voltage regulator circuit with zener diode at low frequency
item.description: Abstract We present a noise analysis of regulated power supplies. Basic zener diode regulated power supply is employed. We studied noise characteristics at very low frequency (sub hertz), low frequency(up to 10k) and relatively high frequency (up to 100k).

item.title: Function Generator using OpAmp
item.description: Abstract Function generator are useful tools in academia and industries. Mostly they are avalaible in market. In this project we are trying to understand and study simple frequency generators with use of OpAmp.

item.title: Concequences of Approximations in physics
item.description: Abstract Approximation methods is essential topic in physical science but consequences are rarely discussed. In this project we are trying to discuss one classical example of approximation from early physics stage.
